alert.note: Alert for White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 7:51PM CST until January 13 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Arkansas... White River At Augusta affecting Woodruff and White Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO FRIDAY, JANUARY 13... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Augusta. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to Friday, January 13. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Farm ground along the river in White and Woodruff counties begin to flood. Seasonal agricultural impacts. At 28.0 feet, Roads in Henry Gray Hurricane Lake Wildlife Management area flooded. Thousands of acres of cultivated land flooded in White and Woodruff counties. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 22.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening (Wednesday 1/4) to a crest of 28.4 feet by early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday, January 11. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 6 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Crest Time Date White River Augusta 26.0 22.4 Tue 7 PM 25.7 28.0 28.4 28.4 12 PM 1/06 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
